main event: Two observers watched a red blinking light travel toward the southern horizon, which was concluded to be possibly an aircraft.
interesting points: The object appeared to be coming closer before moving away,The car was stopped for a better view of the UFO,The sighting lasted for about 5 minutes,The light hovered, maneuvered strangely, and shot straight up out of sight,One observer felt certain it was something extraordinary and not a typical aircraft or satellite.
